methods.name: activateMinecart
javadoc: Called every tick the minecart is on an activator rail.

methods.name: getContainerSize
javadoc: Returns the number of slots in the inventory.

methods.name: getLevelX
javadoc: Gets the world X position for this hopper entity.

methods.name: getLevelY
javadoc: Gets the world Y position for this hopper entity.

methods.name: getLevelZ
javadoc: Gets the world Z position for this hopper entity.

methods.name: isEnabled
javadoc: Get whether this hopper minecart is being blocked by an activator rail.

methods.name: isOnCooldown
javadoc: Returns whether the hopper cart can currently transfer an item.

methods.name: readAdditionalSaveData
javadoc: (abstract) Protected helper method to read subclass entity data from NBT.

methods.name: setCooldown
javadoc: Sets the transfer ticker, used to determine the delay between transfers.

methods.name: setEnabled
javadoc: Set whether this hopper minecart is being blocked by an activator rail.

methods.name: tick
javadoc: Called to update the entity's position/logic.
